00001 #include <fstream>
00002 #include <string>
00003 #include <sstream>

00005 namespace LibTIM {
00006 
00007 inline std::string  GImageIO_NextLine(std::ifstream &file)
00008 {
00009  std::string str;
00010  file >> str;
00011  char buf[256];
00012  char ch;
00013  while(str[0]=='#'){file.getline(buf,256,'\n'); file>>str;}
00014  
00015  //For the separator after the ASCII string ('\n' or ' ') 
00016  file.get(ch);
00017  return str;
00018 }
00019 
00020 inline void GImageIO_ReadPPMHeader(std::ifstream &file, std::string &format, 
00021 unsigned int &width, unsigned int &height, unsigned int &colormax )
00022 {
00023           std::string str;
00024           
00025           str=GImageIO_NextLine(file);
00026       
00027       format=str;
00028       
00029       str=GImageIO_NextLine(file);
00030       std::stringstream str_stream(str); 
00031       str_stream>> width;
00032        
00033       str=GImageIO_NextLine(file);
00034       str_stream.clear();
00035       str_stream.str(str); 
00036       str_stream>> height;
00037      
00038       
00039       str=GImageIO_NextLine(file);
00040       str_stream.clear();
00041       str_stream.str(str); 
00042       str_stream>> colormax;
00043       
00044       
00045      // std::cout << format << "\n" << width << " " << height << "\n" << colormax << "\n";
00046 }
00047 
00048 template <> 
00049 inline int Image<U8>::load(const char*filename, Image <U8> &im)
00050 {
00051         std::ifstream file(filename,std::ios_base::in  | std::ios_base::binary);
00052         std::string format;
00053         unsigned int width,height,colormax;
00054       
00055     GImageIO_ReadPPMHeader(file,format,width,height,colormax);
00056    
00057     if(format!="P5" || colormax >=256)
00058         {
00059         std::cerr<< "Error: either type mismatch image type or image is in ASCII .ppm format\n";
00060         exit(1);
00061         }
00062     else {
00063         if(im.data!=(U8*)(0)) delete im.data;
00064         
00065         im.size[0] = width;
00066                 im.size[1] = height;
00067                 im.size[2] = 1;
00068                 im.dataSize=width*height*1;
00069         
00070                 for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00071                         {
00072                         im.spacing[i] = 1.0;
00073                         }
00074                 im.data = new U8 [im.dataSize];
00075         file.read(reinterpret_cast<char *> (im.data),im.dataSize);
00076                 }
00077 }

00110 inline int Image<RGB>::load(const char*filename, Image <RGB> &im)

00113         std::string format;

00119         {

00121         exit(1);

00123     else {
00124         if(im.data!=(RGB*)(0)) delete im.data;

00142 template <> 
00143 inline void Image <U8>::save( const char *filename) {
00144       std::ofstream file(filename,std::ios_base::trunc  | std::ios_base::binary);
00145       std::string str;
00146       std::string format;
00147       
00148           int width=getSizeX();
00149           int height=getSizeY();
00150           
00151       int buf_size = width*height;
00152       
00153       int maxVal=(int)(this->getMax());
00154           
00155           file << "P5\n#CREATOR: GImage \n" << width << " " << height << "\n" << "255" ;
00156           file << "\n";
00157           
00158           file.write(reinterpret_cast<char *> (this->data),buf_size);
00159           
00160           file << "\n";
00161           
00162           file.close();
00163 }

00166 template <> 
00167 inline void Image <U16>::save( const char *filename) {
00168       std::ofstream file(filename,std::ios_base::trunc  | std::ios_base::binary);
00169       std::string str;
00170       std::string format;
00171       
00172           int width=getSizeX();
00173           int height=getSizeY();
00174           
00175       int buf_size = width*height*sizeof(U16);
00176       
00177       int maxVal=(int)(this->getMax());
00178           
00179           file << "P5\n#CREATOR: GImage \n" << width << " " << height << "\n" << "65535\n" ;
00180           
00181           file.write(reinterpret_cast<char *> (this->data),buf_size);
00182           
00183           file << "\n";
00184           
00185           file.close();
00186 }

00188 template <> 
00189 inline void Image <RGB>::save( const char *filename) {
00190       std::ofstream file(filename,std::ios_base::trunc  | std::ios_base::binary);
00191       std::string str;
00192       std::string format;
00193       
00194       int width=getSizeX();
00195           int height=getSizeY();
00196          
00197       int buf_size = width*height*3;
00198 
00199       file << "P6\n#CREATOR: GImage \n" << width << " " << height << "\n" << "255\n" ;
00200       
00201       U8 *buf=new U8[width*height*3];
00202       
00203       for(int i=0; i<width*height; i++)
00204         {
00205         buf[i*3]=(*this)(i)[0];
00206         buf[i*3+1]=(*this)(i)[1];
00207         buf[i*3+2]=(*this)(i)[2];
00208         }
00209       
00210           file.write(reinterpret_cast<char *> (buf),buf_size);
00211                 
00212           file << "\n";
00213          
00214           file.close();
00215 }
